sentences.en: Beside one manicured lawn, there is a neo - gothic church complete with 200 ft steeple.
sentences.cn: 在一片修剪齐整的草坪旁边, 矗立着一座新哥特式教堂,尖顶足有200英尺高.

sentences.en: He was surprised to see how carefully she had manicured her broad hands.
sentences.cn: 看到她如此细心地修剪她那双大手，他十分惊讶。

sentences.en: She stared out at the impeccably manicured garden.
sentences.cn: 她向外望去，注视着修剪得整整齐齐、无可挑剔的花园。
指甲修得很漂亮的纤纤手指

sentences.en: The average golfer sees acres of manicured grass and is encouraged to swing without fear.
sentences.cn: 一般的球手看到修剪的区域,会毫不顾忌的挥杆.

trans.tran_en: manicured hands or fingers have nails that are neatly cut and polished
